review: Well just bought this game my views on it so ar is  the trees,plants mountains all look good animals work well.The crafting is ok a few tricky bits to work through ie the builders table to add people for permission seems weird anyway the crafting is pretty good.Long term i think this game will take off they are starting to sort out servers better so soon people can have their own to mod or whatever they want to do.is the ame worth it yeh i think it is its not rust so dont compare to rust lol
